channel.title: Need a fix soon please
channel.description: I added the Ava's Accumulator to my server, but I can't get it to save your arrows. How do you make it so it randomly keeps the arrows you shoot? Thanks loads![br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 30, 2009, 08:03:38 pm[/size][hr][quote="hitman2009"]I added the Ava's Accumulator to my server, but I can't get it to save your arrows. How do you make it so it randomly keeps the arrows you shoot? Thanks loads![/quote] nobody knows?
